content: 5 stitch ripple scarf pattern by samantha attanasio crochetsam@attanasio org hook size h 5 0mm yarn any worsted weight yarn approx 280 yards gauge 1 = 4dc and 2 double_crochet row this will make a 62 scarf that is 5 5 wide terms chain ­ chain skip ­ skip double_crochet ­ double_crochet st s ­ stitch es notes ● in all row turning chain does count as first stitch of row ● the first and last stitch of each row will be 2 double_crochet in 1 ● all stitches should be worked into back loop chain 28 turn row 1 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook 4 double_crochet skip 2 5 double_crochet 3 double_crochet in 1 5 double_crochet skip 2 4 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in 1 chain 3 and turn row 2­93 double_crochet in same st as turning chain 4 double_crochet skip 2 5 double_crochet 3 double_crochet in 1 5 double_crochet skip 2 4 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in 1 chain 3 and turn row 94 double_crochet in same st as turning chain 4 double_crochet skip 2 5 double_crochet 3 double_crochet in 1 5 double_crochet skip 2 4 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in 1 fasten_off
